column1: Please share with your elected officials! Responding to Coronavirus
That's a heavy load to carry, Donnie. Ignoring repeated Intelligence briefings, warning of the coronavirus, "hoaxing" the whole thing away, wasting precious planning time? Mr. ZERO.

'K Researchers describe a recently identified bat coronavirus that is SARS-CoV-2's closest relative in some regions of the genome and which contains insertions of amino acids at the junction of the S1 and S2 subunits of the virus's spike protein in a manner similar to SAR-CoV-2
Hate to see what the coronavirus rates are going to be like in a week or two.
